He emphasized that the recording was not released because he had important business on Monday, "I don't want this kind of argument and bickering to get sidetracked. Luo Yonghao revealed: "He was cursing at the time, and then I warned him, and then he came over and apologized and admitted his mistake, and also said how much business he lost. Luo Yonghao also raised a question: "But I don't know why, after he said that, he immediately started to sarcastically curse at me again. During the live broadcast, Luo Yonghao also revealed that the recording contains a lot of profanity and cannot be released normally . item.description:
According to China News Service, XPeng Motors Vice President Chen Han stated in an interview: æ®ä¸­æ–°ç½‘ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œå°é¹æ±½è½¦å‰¯æ€»è£é™ˆæ¶µåœ¨æ¥å—é‡‡è®¿æ—¶è¡¨ç¤ºï¼š

From the very beginning of our development, we defined ourselves not just as a Chinese automobile manufacturing enterprise, but as a technology enterprise with cutting-edge intelligent driving technology as its core advantage.

He further explained that when AI cars, flying cars, and embodied intelligence achieve deep synergy through a unified AI brain, we no longer see them as isolated tools, but as intelligent symbiotic entities in users' lives. å…¶è¿›ä¸€æ­¥è§£é‡Šè¯´ï¼Œå½“ AI æ±½è½¦ã€é£è¡Œæ±½è½¦ã€å…·èº«æ™ºèƒ½é€šè¿‡ç»Ÿä¸€çš„ AI å¤§è„‘å®ç°æ·±åº¦ååŒåï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬ä¸å†å°†å…¶çœ‹æˆå­¤ç«‹çš„å·¥å…·äº†ï¼Œè€Œæ˜¯ç”¨æˆ·ç”Ÿæ´»ä¸­çš„æ™ºèƒ½å…±ç”Ÿä½“ã€‚

She believes that against the backdrop of rapid technological development, the future of the travel sector has broad prospects. And the current "anti-involution" is a crucial and inevitable step for the industry to gradually mature and move towards high-quality development. å¥¹è®¤ä¸ºï¼Œåœ¨ç§‘æŠ€é£é€Ÿå‘å±•çš„èƒŒæ™¯ä¸‹ï¼Œæœªæ¥å‡ºè¡Œé¢†åŸŸå‘å±•å‰æ™¯å¹¿é˜”ã€‚ è€Œå½“ä¸‹çš„ã€Œåå†…å·ã€æ˜¯è¡Œä¸šé€æ­¥èµ°å‘æˆç†Ÿã€è¿ˆå‘é«˜è´¨é‡å‘å±•çš„ä¸€ä¸ªå…³é”®ï¼Œä¹Ÿæ˜¯å¿…ç„¶çš„ä¸€æ­¥ã€‚

According to IT Home, several executives from car companies have previously expressed their views on "anti-involution": æ® IT ä¹‹å®¶æ¶ˆæ¯ï¼Œæ­¤å‰ä¹Ÿæœ‰å¤šä½è½¦ä¼é«˜ç®¡æ›¾å¯¹ã€Œåå†…å·ã€è¿›è¡Œè¿‡è¡¨æ€ï¼š

    Lei Jun, founder, chairman, and CEO of Xiaomi: Xiaomi Auto actively responds to the call of the authorities and resolutely implements anti-involution. For suppliers, it actively responded to 60-day payments, and Xiaomi's performance in this regard is also well-known. "In terms of competition, we also firmly oppose price wars and aim for the high-end market. We implement higher standards and resolutely fulfill the requirements of the authorities."

    Geely Automobile Holdings Executive President Gui Shengyue: The national advocacy for anti-involution is not just about opposing price wars; Geely Auto must learn from the strengths of its competitors, avoid speaking ill of them, and focus on doing its own work well. If every Chinese car company achieves these three points, it will be responding to the nation's anti-involution call.

    Jochen Goller, President and CEO of BMW Group Region China: A series of structural challenges have brought unprecedented risks and uncertainties to the future development trajectory of the automotive industry, and involutionary competition will hinder the healthy development of the industry. Persistent price wars have driven industry profitability to extremely low levels, which, if not effectively addressed, will lead to quality compromises, stifle innovation, and ultimately affect the sustainable development of the industry.

item.title: ChatGPT è¢«æ›å°†æ¨å‡ºå¹¿å‘Š
item.description:
According to X platform user Tibor, new code related to "advertising features" has appeared in the ChatGPT Android app 1.2025.329 beta, including terms like "marketplace content," "search ads," and "search ad carousel," indicating that advertising features are about to be rolled out to the public. æ® X å¹³å°ç”¨æˆ· Tibor å‘ç°ï¼ŒChatGPT å®‰å“åº”ç”¨ 1.2025.329 æµ‹è¯•ç‰ˆä¸­å‡ºç°äº†ä¸ã€Œå¹¿å‘ŠåŠŸèƒ½ã€ç›¸å…³çš„æ–°ä»£ç ï¼ŒåŒ…å«ã€Œé›†å¸‚å†…å®¹ã€ã€ã€Œæœç´¢å¹¿å‘Šã€å’Œã€Œæœç´¢å¹¿å‘Šè½®æ’­ã€ç­‰å­—çœ¼ï¼Œè¡¨æ˜å¹¿å‘ŠåŠŸèƒ½å³å°†å‘å…¬ä¼—æ¨å‡ºã€‚

Previously, ChatGPT maintained a completely free user experience, and although it offered paid premium plans, it never promoted products or displayed ads to users. In contrast, Google Search has long influenced user purchasing decisions through advertising. æ­¤å‰ ChatGPT ä¸€ç›´ä¿æŒå®Œå…¨å…è´¹çš„ä½¿ç”¨ä½“éªŒï¼Œè™½ç„¶æä¾›ä»˜è´¹é«˜çº§å¥—é¤ï¼Œä½†ä»æœªå‘ç”¨æˆ·æ¨é”€äº§å“æˆ–å±•ç¤ºå¹¿å‘Šã€‚ç›¸æ¯”ä¹‹ä¸‹ï¼Œè°·æ­Œæœç´¢é•¿æœŸé€šè¿‡å¹¿å‘Šå½±å“ç”¨æˆ·è´­ä¹°å†³ç­–ã€‚

Now OpenAI is expected to replicate a similar business model. å¦‚ä»Š OpenAI é¢„è®¡å¤åˆ¶ç±»ä¼¼çš„å•†ä¸šæ¨¡å¼ã€‚

In terms of user scale, ChatGPT already has a solid foundation for its advertising business. Currently, it has approximately 800 million weekly active users. OpenAI-backed research previously estimated that by July this year, 700 million users would send 18 billion messages weekly, while other analysts estimate monthly visits of 5 to 6 billion. ä»ç”¨æˆ·è§„æ¨¡çœ‹ï¼ŒChatGPT å·²å…·å¤‡å¹¿å‘Šä¸šåŠ¡çš„åšå®åŸºç¡€ã€‚ç›®å‰æ¯å‘¨æ´»è·ƒç”¨æˆ·é‡çº¦ 8 äº¿ã€‚OpenAI æ”¯æŒçš„ç ”ç©¶æ›¾é¢„è®¡ï¼Œåˆ°ä»Šå¹´ 7 æœˆå°†æœ‰ 7 äº¿ç”¨æˆ·æ¯å‘¨å‘é€ 180 äº¿æ¡æ¶ˆæ¯ï¼Œå…¶ä»–åˆ†æå¸ˆä¼°ç®—æœˆè®¿é—®é‡è¾¾ 50 äº¿è‡³ 60 äº¿æ¬¡ã€‚

OpenAI can leverage this data to place highly personalized ads on ChatGPT, accurately recommending products users truly want to buy, and potentially embedding ads in search results much like Google Search ads. item.title: ğŸ’¡ å´æ©è¾¾ï¼šAI æœ‰æ²¡æœ‰æ³¡æ²«ï¼Œè¦çœ‹å¤§å®¶æ€ä¹ˆç”¨
item.description:
Recently, Andrew Ng, Associate Professor in the Computer Science Department at Stanford University, shared his views on the hot topic of the AI bubble on his personal social media account. è¿‘æœŸï¼Œæ–¯å¦ç¦å¤§å­¦è®¡ç®—æœºç§‘å­¦ç³»å‰¯æ•™æˆå´æ©è¾¾åœ¨ä¸ªäººç¤¾äº¤åª’ä½“è´¦å·ï¼Œå‘è¡¨äº†è‡ªå·±å¯¹äº AI æ³¡æ²«è¿™ä¸€çƒ­é—¨è¯é¢˜çš„çœ‹æ³•ã€‚

Nowadays, with OpenAI's infrastructure plan reaching up to $1.4 trillion, and Nvidia's market capitalization briefly touching the $5 trillion mark, more and more voices are beginning to question: have hype and speculation pushed AI investments to unsustainable levels? ç°å¦‚ä»Šï¼Œéšç€ OpenAI é«˜è¾¾ 1.4 ä¸‡äº¿ç¾å…ƒçš„åŸºå»ºè®¡åˆ’ï¼Œä»¥åŠè‹±ä¼Ÿè¾¾å¸‚å€¼çŸ­æš‚è§¦åŠ 5 ä¸‡äº¿ç¾å…ƒå¤§å…³ï¼Œè¶Šæ¥è¶Šå¤šçš„å£°éŸ³å¼€å§‹è´¨ç–‘ï¼šç‚’ä½œå’ŒæŠ•æœºæ˜¯å¦å·²å°† AI æŠ•èµ„æ¨é«˜åˆ°äº†ä¸å¯æŒç»­çš„æ°´å¹³ï¼Ÿ

In response, Andrew Ng offered his view: AI is not a monolith, and the degree of speculation varies across different domains. He listed the following points: å¯¹æ­¤ï¼Œå´æ©è¾¾å°±ç»™å‡ºäº†è‡ªå·±çš„çœ‹æ³•ï¼šAI å¹¶éé“æ¿ä¸€å—ï¼Œè€Œä¸åŒé¢†åŸŸçš„æ³¡æ²«ç¨‹åº¦å„ä¸ç›¸åŒã€‚å…¶åˆ—å‡ºäº†ä»¥ä¸‹è§‚ç‚¹ï¼š

    AI Application Layer: Underinvested. Its potential far exceeds most people's perception. Andrew Ng predicts that in the next decade, many applications built on new AI technologies have yet to be created. "It can almost be asserted that applications built on AI infrastructure/technology (such as LLM APIs) must be more valuable than the infrastructure itself."

    AI Inference Infrastructure: Still requires significant investment. Andrew Ng pointed out that despite the current low penetration rate of AI, infrastructure providers are already struggling to meet the demand for processing power to generate tokens.

    AI Model Training Infrastructure: Cautiously optimistic, but potential for a bubble. Andrew Ng admitted that if a part of the AI tech stack (perhaps in training infrastructure) collapses due to overinvestment, it could lead to broader negative market sentiment towards AI, and an irrational outflow of rational interest in investing in AI, despite the strong fundamentals of the field as a whole.

At the same time, Z-Image possesses extensive knowledge of the real world, capable of accurately generating famous landmarks (e.g., Eiffel Tower, Forbidden City), well-known figures, and specific cultural elements (e.g., Spring Festival window decorations, British telephone booths), ensuring that the images conform to real-world common sense in terms of detail, proportion, and context. åŒæ—¶ï¼ŒZ-Image å…·å¤‡å¯¹ç°å®ä¸–ç•Œçš„å¹¿æ³›è®¤çŸ¥ï¼Œèƒ½å‡†ç¡®ç”Ÿæˆè‘—ååœ°æ ‡ï¼ˆå¦‚åŸƒè²å°”é“å¡”ã€æ•…å®«ï¼‰ã€çŸ¥åäººç‰©åŠç‰¹å®šæ–‡åŒ–å…ƒç´ ï¼ˆå¦‚æ˜¥èŠ‚çª—èŠ±ã€è‹±å¼ç”µè¯äº­ï¼‰ï¼Œç¡®ä¿ç”»é¢åœ¨ç»†èŠ‚ã€æ¯”ä¾‹ä¸è¯­å¢ƒä¸Šç¬¦åˆçœŸå®å¸¸è¯†ã€‚

item.title: ç”µåŠ¨è‡ªè¡Œè½¦æ–°è§„ä»Šæ—¥ä¸Šçº¿
item.description:
According to CCTV News, on September 1st this year, the mandatory new national standard for electric bicycles, "Safety Technical Specification for Electric Bicycles" (GB 17761â€”2024), officially came into effect. æ®å¤®è§†æ–°é—»æŠ¥é“ï¼Œä»Šå¹´ 9 æœˆ 1 æ—¥ï¼Œç”µåŠ¨è‡ªè¡Œè½¦å¼ºåˆ¶æ€§æ–°å›½æ ‡ã€Šç”µåŠ¨è‡ªè¡Œè½¦å®‰å…¨æŠ€æœ¯è§„èŒƒã€‹ï¼ˆGB 17761â€”2024ï¼‰æ­£å¼å®æ–½ã€‚

Recently, the Certification and Accreditation Administration of China officially issued the "Announcement on Strictly Regulating Mandatory Product Certification for Electric Bicycles" (No. 25 of 2025), which makes clear provisions for the production and sale of electric bicycles. è¿‘æ—¥ï¼Œå›½å®¶è®¤ç›‘å§”æ­£å¼å‘å¸ƒã€Šå…³äºä¸¥æ ¼ç”µåŠ¨è‡ªè¡Œè½¦å¼ºåˆ¶æ€§äº§å“è®¤è¯ç®¡ç†çš„å…¬å‘Šã€‹ï¼ˆ2025 å¹´ç¬¬ 25 å·ï¼‰ï¼Œå¯¹ç”µåŠ¨è‡ªè¡Œè½¦ç”Ÿäº§ã€é”€å”®ä½œå‡ºæ˜ç¡®è§„å®šã€‚

According to the "Announcement," starting today (December 1st), all electric bicycle products sold must comply with the new mandatory national standard, and "old national standard" electric bicycles will be completely discontinued. The "Announcement" clarifies: æ ¹æ®ã€Šå…¬å‘Šã€‹ï¼Œä»Šå¤©ï¼ˆ12 æœˆ 1 æ—¥ï¼‰èµ·ï¼Œæ‰€æœ‰é”€å”®çš„ç”µåŠ¨è‡ªè¡Œè½¦äº§å“å‡å¿…é¡»ç¬¦åˆæ–°ç‰ˆå¼ºåˆ¶æ€§å›½å®¶æ ‡å‡†ï¼Œã€Œæ—§å›½æ ‡ã€ç”µåŠ¨è‡ªè¡Œè½¦å…¨é¢åœå”®ã€‚ã€Šå…¬å‘Šã€‹æ˜ç¡®ï¼š

    All valid CCC certification certificates for electric bicycles issued by designated certification bodies based on the old version of the standard will be cancelled on December 1, 2025;

    All CCC certification certificates issued based on the old standard, which are in a suspended state and cannot be effectively restored, will be revoked on December 1, 2025;

    Electric bicycle sales enterprises shall not continue to sell products from the date of cancellation or revocation of the certification certificate. If the above provisions are violated, market supervision departments at all levels will investigate and deal with them according to law.

For consumers who have already purchased electric bicycles conforming to the old national standard, they can still use them normally after December 1st. å¯¹äºå·²è´­ä¹°æ—§å›½æ ‡ç”µåŠ¨è‡ªè¡Œè½¦çš„æ¶ˆè´¹è€…ï¼Œåœ¨ 12 æœˆ 1 æ—¥åï¼Œä¾ç„¶èƒ½å¤Ÿæ­£å¸¸ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚

Vehicles that consumers have already purchased and registered but do not comply with the new national standard will not be forcibly eliminated. However, old national standard electric vehicles that have been purchased but not registered need to complete registration and licensing before November 30, 2025. æ¶ˆè´¹è€…å·²ç»è´­ä¹°ä¸Šç‰Œçš„ä¸ç¬¦åˆæ–°å›½æ ‡çš„è½¦è¾†ä¸ä¼šè¢«å¼ºåˆ¶æ·˜æ±°ï¼Œè€Œå·²è´­ä¹°æœªä¸Šç‰Œçš„æ—§å›½æ ‡ç”µåŠ¨è½¦ï¼Œåˆ™éœ€åœ¨ 2025 å¹´ 11 æœˆ 30 æ—¥å‰å®Œæˆç™»è®°ä¸Šç‰Œã€‚

item.title: ç¾å›¢è‡ªç§°æ˜¯ã€Œæœ€é€‚åˆé—ªè´­çš„å¹³å°ã€
item.description:
Recently, Meituan released its third-quarter financial report, which showed its first quarterly loss in three years amidst fierce market competition: è¿‘æœŸï¼Œç¾å›¢å…¬å¸ƒäº†å…¶ç¬¬ä¸‰å­£åº¦è´¢æŠ¥ï¼Œå¹¶æ˜¾ç¤ºå…¶åœ¨æ¿€çƒˆçš„å¸‚åœºç«äº‰ä¸‹é­é‡ä¸‰å¹´æ¥é¦–æ¬¡å­£åº¦äºæŸï¼š

    Revenue performance: Meituan's third-quarter revenue was 95.5 billion yuan, a year-on-year increase of 2.0%, lower than market expectations;

    Net profit performance: Adjusted net loss was 16 billion yuan, compared to a net profit of 12.8 billion yuan in the same period last year; the overall net loss reached 18.6 billion yuan;

    Competitive landscape: Alibaba and JD.com invested huge subsidies in the food delivery and instant retail markets, putting pressure on Meituan's market share.

Chen Shaohui stated that Meituan Instashopping has an extremely strong competitive advantage in native supply, even surpassing the company's already leading food delivery business. It pointed out that in order to better serve users' flash purchase experience, Meituan is also promoting the upgrade of infrastructure and service experience across the entire industry: å…¶æŒ‡å‡ºï¼Œä¸ºäº†æ›´å¥½åœ°æœåŠ¡ç”¨æˆ·çš„é—ªè´­ä½“éªŒï¼Œç¾å›¢ä¹Ÿåœ¨æ¨åŠ¨å…¨è¡Œä¸šçš„åŸºç¡€è®¾æ–½å’ŒæœåŠ¡ä½“éªŒå‡çº§ï¼š

    Expanded several Meituan Flash Purchase warehouses and pharmacies, equipping them with refrigeration facilities for alcoholic beverages and drinks;

Gargano also pointed out that AI not only teaches people to cook incorrectly but also includes attractive pictures in the generated summary recipes.
